Author: pg
Content: We're almost as important as Perez Hilton...

Author: run4yourlives
Content:
Perhaps even more important:

Four of those countries speak English, so there is no reason for most people to exclude them based on language barriers.

The US, UK, Canada and India are all equally viable.

Author: zaidf
Content:
That's why I am headed to India this summer if all goes well:)

--Zaid

Author: zaidf
Content: Big part of the puzzle is to build value in your potential cofounder's eyes from your past ________ experiences. It is a two way street: your cofounder should need you as much as you need him. -Zaid
